hiveArticle.title: When it comes in Advertisement, nothing can beat Durex
hiveArticle.body:
Have a look at the below advertisement it says "Dear JON, We Incest you use Protection". They are insisting Jon to have condom before doing anything.

If you do not know Durex is the trademarked name for a range of condoms that were made by United Kingdom-based SSL International.

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVpgQEi5rWNeA3MN8hzxR1KWieHAC5fR9oZdBhDRXJzyn/image.png)
Disclaimer: The picture is not mine.
